member.name: D3D11_SHADER_TRACE_DESC.Type
member.summary: A -typed value that identifies the type of shader that the shader-trace object describes. This member also determines which shader-trace type to use in the following union.

summary.para: A combination of the following flags that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies how creates the shader-trace object.

listheader.description: The shader trace object records register-writes.
The shader trace object records register-reads.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_TRACE_DESC.VertexShaderTraceDesc
member.summary: A structure that describes an instance of a vertex shader to trace.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_TRACE_DESC.HullShaderTraceDesc
member.summary: A structure that describes an instance of a hull shader to trace.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_TRACE_DESC.DomainShaderTraceDesc
member.summary: A structure that describes an instance of a domain shader to trace.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_TRACE_DESC.GeometryShaderTraceDesc
member.summary: A structure that describes an instance of a geometry shader to trace.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_TRACE_DESC.PixelShaderTraceDesc
member.summary: A structure that describes an instance of a pixel shader to trace.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_TRACE_DESC.ComputeShaderTraceDesc
member.summary: A structure that describes an instance of a compute shader to trace.
